name: scitime: The SCIentific TIME library
short_description: scitime is a C library designed to provide an advanced API to work with date and times (precision up to femtosecs, 1E-15 secs). It supports scientific time formats (like JD, MJD, MJD2000, GPSweek/sec) and time scales (UTC, GPS time, TAI, UT).
